summary: Accomplished Senior Software Engineer with over 6 years of experience in a variety of technical domains specialising in Azure and .NET Core, with strong foundations in SQL, Python and NodeJS. Proven ability as a team leader, mentor, and key contributor, driving high-impact projects to success within agile and ever-evolving business environments. Passionate about personal growth, quality work, and engaging in diverse interests such as music production, digital art, electronics, AI, and web development.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: â€¢ Successfully expanded the Partner Fulfils project to over 40 brands across 5 countries, now handling 3% of ASOS' total orders and bringing significant revenue for the company. â€¢ Delivered new business-critical features enabling partners to own the creation of new products, stock our items on partner websites and allow them to commision the use of ASOS warehouses and shipping facilities. This enables the company to take full advantage of the partners' product range, improve stock position by clearing stale stock, and to leverage new revenue sources from existing infrastructure. â€¢ Played a central role in team expansion through candidate interviewing, assessing, mentoring, and onboarding of 3 new engineers as well as 3 internal moves to the team. â€¢ Took a proactive role in high-level business and architectural decisions, delivering on priorities by managing, delegating, and communicating effectively across multidisciplinary teams.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: â€¢ Delivered the Partner Fulfils project within 6 months for 2 brands: Adidas and Reebok, enabling the brands to ship directly to the customer, reducing risk and expanding stock coverage. â€¢ Collaborated in a cross-team effort to deliver Ratings and Reviews - projected to reduce returns and increase conversion rate with a corresponding effect on profitability. â€¢ Delivered a new solution to obtain customer metrics (e.g. product views, add to bag), reducing the lead for obtaining this from days to minutes. This data fed into product sorting which gave customers a much more up-to-date view of the catalogue. â€¢ Implemented cost-saving and feature enrichment with other projects such as Buy the Look, Visual Search, AKS Migration, and Store Consolidation. â€¢ Delivered training sessions on Docker, AKS and containerisation to other ASOS employees.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
experience.description: â€¢ I contributed to a number of projects, delivering high quality, well tested code by applying TDD and SOLID principles, and helping to deliver key projects to their deadline. â€¢ Became a member of the support team, debugging and fixing issues outsite of office hours when incidents occurred. â€¢ Quickly picked up domain knowledge to make an impact early on, aiding the team as an engineer and problem-solver, and facilitating collaboration and communication through clearly articulated ideas and constructive engagement with others.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: â€¢ Delivered a full-stack solution which facilitated vulnerable patients to be transferred from hospital into home care quicker, abstracting the legacy software from the users through a functional and usable UI. â€¢ Improved the usability of the pothole reporting website. â€¢ Took a leading role in architectural decisions and defining work, applying this to the successful delivery of Agile projects.
